original: Araṇaṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
Saraṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Araṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Araṇaṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
